title: Define CRM-embedded Guidance surface (UI spec + entry points)

sections.text: Specify the minimum viable in-CRM UI for viewing Sales_Accelerator guidance without leaving Salesforce/HubSpot (e.g., sidebar panel, record page card, or extension). Document where guidance should appear for Accounts and Opportunities, what content blocks are in scope (best-next-action, risk alerts, fit/positioning snippets), and expected copy actions. Include wireframe-level requirements and acceptance criteria to unblock implementation tickets.
